mapper.insert: insert into out_train_all(ota_id, ota_title, training_name, training_lv, course_name, training_location, training_money, training_date, attendees,course_desc,training_reason,om_id) values(#{trainAll.otaId},#{trainAll.otaTitle},#{trainAll.trainingName},#{trainAll.trainingLv},#{trainAll.courseName}, #{trainAll.trainingLocation},#{trainAll.trainingMoney},#{trainAll.trainingDate},#{trainAll.attendees}, #{trainAll.courseDesc},#{trainAll.trainingReason},#{trainAll.omId})
mapper.update: update out_train_all set ota_title=#{trainAll.otaTitle},training_name=#{trainAll.trainingName},training_lv=#{trainAll.trainingLv}, course_name=#{trainAll.courseName},training_location=#{trainAll.trainingLocation},training_money=#{trainAll.trainingMoney}, training_date=#{trainAll.trainingDate},attendees=#{trainAll.attendees},course_desc=#{trainAll.courseDesc},training_reason=#{trainAll.trainingReason}, om_id=#{trainAll.omId} where ota_id=#{trainAll.otaId}
mapper.select: select a.ota_id, a.ota_title, a.training_name, a.training_lv, a.course_name, a.training_location, a.training_money, a.training_date, a.attendees,a.course_desc,a.training_reason,a.om_id,c.om_name from out_train_all as a left join mode_status as b on a.ota_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN organization_management as c on a.om_id=c.om_id where b.status=2
